mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `product_in_storage` INNER JOIN `product_in_storage_details` ON `product_in_storage`.`num` = `product_in_storage_details`.`code` INNER JOIN `material_details` ON `product_in_storage_details`.`material_code` = `material_details`.`material_code` INNER JOIN `measuring_unit` ON `material_details`.`unit` = `measuring_unit`.`id` INNER JOIN `warehouse_level_two` ON `product_in_storage_details`.`warehouse_id` = `warehouse_level_two`.`id` INNER JOIN `department` ON `product_in_storage`.`department_id` = `department`.`id` INNER JOIN `lcap_user_a6d592` ON `product_in_storage`.`user_id` = `lcap_user_a6d592`.`user_id`
`product_in_storage`.`num` = #{num}
